title: Dala Floda Alternative
content:
I've been seeing a few variations of serif display faces that bump the thick/thin contrast to the point where the thin strokes disappear. Dala Floda is such an example. [http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala\_floda](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418175102/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala_floda "http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/dala\_floda")

While Dala Floda fits the bill, I've seen some more sinewy and sexy examples. Any suggestions?
author: ian00

comments.content:
You might like these lists by us.  
 [http://typecache.com/font-clusters/05/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418175102/http:/typecache.com/font-clusters/05/ "http://typecache.com/font-clusters/05/")
